name: thundercats-chat
description: Example Flux chat application primarily intended to explain the use of http://thundercats.js.org

scripts.start: watchify js/app.jsx -r react -d -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -g envify -o js/bundle.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify js/app.jsx -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -g envify -o js/bundle.js
